mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.assemble_id AS "assembleId", a.item AS "item", a.part AS "part", a.context AS "context", a.result_assemble_id AS "resultAssembleId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", tba.id AS "ba.id", tba.name AS "ba.name", tbra.id AS "tbra.id", tbra.name AS "tbra.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_spot_item( id, name, assemble_id, item, part, context, result_assemble_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{assembleId}, #{item}, #{part}, #{context}, #{resultAssembleId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE check_spot_item SET name = #{name}, assemble_id = #{assembleId}, item = #{item}, part = #{part}, context = #{context}, result_assemble_id = #{resultAssembleId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
